creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: Faience écuelle; dish with two floral sprays in color, two green leaf and twig handles, each handle with raised flowers; cover with raised flower and twig finial and two floral sprays; underplate brown scrolling edge
title: Covered bowl with serving plate
